title: Taro no To
text:
"Taro no To" (<a href="Japanese%20language">Japanese</a> title TAROの塔) is a 2011 <a href="Japanese%20television%20drama">dorama</a> created by <a href="NHK">NHK</a>. Directed by NHK employees Yoshihiko Nagikawa and Mitsuhiro Fukui, it stars <a href="Suzuki%20Matsuo">Suzuki Matsuo</a> as <a href="Okamoto%20Taro">Okamoto Taro</a> during his rise to fame and the construction of the <a href="Tower%20of%20the%20Sun">Tower of the Sun</a> in <a href="Osaka">Osaka</a>.
Overview.
The drama aired on Saturdays beginning at 9:00 on February 26, 2011, a special 4-episode series to commemorate 100 years since the establishment of NHK. The broadcast was disrupted and schedule changed due to the <a href="2011%20T%C5%8Dhoku%20earthquake%20and%20tsunami">Tohoku earthquake on March 11th</a> that year.
